title: The rising threat of SIM swap fraud: Securing digital identity with Network APIs
summary: Mobile phone numbers have become central to securing access to financial services, underpinning authentication methods. However, this reliance has made them prime targets for sophisticated fraud, with SIM swap and mobile number portability attacks exposing vulnerabilities in traditional authentication models. The good news is, advances in network technology are leveling the playing field.
